html:
Seeing . . . opening the ears. As Israel had done. Reference to Pentateuch (Deuteronomy 29:1, Deuteronomy 29:2). But Israel was blind and deaf (Isaiah 42:19). CompareJeremiah 5:21; Jeremiah 6:10. Ezekiel 12:2. Matthew 13:14 , &c.

he. Some codices, with Syriac, read"thou" (as in the preceding clause); others read "ye". The pronoun refers to Israel. SeeIsaiah 42:19 .
